text: But is there a way I can trigger the download manually, before I do any computation?

elements.text: But is there a way I can trigger the download manually, before I do any computation?

text: You can use <https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/api/#Pkg.Artifacts.ensure_all_artifacts_installed|https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/api/#Pkg.Artifacts.ensure_all_artifacts_installed> for this, but you need to specify the location of the Artifact.toml file

elements.text: for this, but you need to specify the location of the Artifact.toml file
